title: Overview of My Experiments
text:
Welcome to My Experiment Series
This book covers a series of experiments related to social norm appeals. Here you will find detailed analyses and findings from each experiment.
Please navigate through the chapters using the links on the side to explore each experiment in detail.

title: 2  Experiment 1: Dynamic Descriptive Social Norm Appeals (representative)
text:
3 Measures
Summary of Measurements
Note. For all statements (except for socio-demographics), respondents could indicate their agreement on a 5-point scale. The study was conducted in German. The translation is based on AI.

title: 2  Experiment 1: Dynamic Descriptive Social Norm Appeals (representative)
text:
2.1 Representative Sample
N = 393, Mage = 46.09, SDage = 15.36, 48.35% female
